question: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) is to set up an Automated Banknote Processing Centre (ABPC) in which city?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has decided to set up an Automated Banknote Processing Centre (ABPC) in Jaipur.
The Centre would undertake all processes for receipt, storage and dispatch of currency notes. It would also process the banknotes received from currency chests and bank branches, and destroy soiled banknotes in an automated manner.
